mapper.select: SELECT u.username as userName, u.id as userId, u.email as email, role.`name` as roleName, menu.id as menuId, menu.`name` as menuName, menu.icon as menuIcon FROM `user` u LEFT JOIN user_role userRole on u.id = userRole.userid left join role role on role.id = userRole.roleid left join role_menu roleMenu on userRole.roleid = roleMenu.roleid left join menu menu on menu.id = roleMenu.menuid where u.email = #{email} and u.`password` = #{password}
